result.execSummary:
The defendant Kaden J Larsen was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Kaden J Larsen is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Kaden J Larsen was found guilty of Invade Privacy - Use Surveillance Device, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 942.08(2)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Notice of right to seek postconviction relief

Defendant in court with Attorney Jacob A Idlas.  Carl Jacob Lazarus appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   

Plea Questionnaire & Waiver of Rights Signed. Def entered a plea of guilty to count 1.  Court accepted defendant's plea, found and adjudged defendant guilty. 

AMENDMENTS: 
On Motion of the State, the Court DISM Count #2 and Repeater on Count #1. 

Victim Rights Compliance

COUNT #1   
Court withholds sentence and places the Defendant on Probation for 12 months, CC to Outagamie County Case 21CM668 

CONDITIONS:
-Not photograph or record anyone without their permission. 
-Obtain GED or high school diploma or equivalency
-No contact with: Lauren L. unless Lauren L. reaches out to defn and only with permission from agent   
-Defendant shall complete a risk and needs assessment and comply with care plan goals 
-DNA on file
-Any other conditions DOC may impose

COURT COSTS:
Ct #1
-All CC and DNA surcharge waived. V/W surcharge due w/in 60 days. Payment plan approved.

-Days credit for time already served: 0 days  
-Days credit if revoked: 0 days

DE advised of post-conviction rights

April L.
